member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExDockSiteHasDocumentItemsSource
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DockSite's DocumentItemsSource property is not empty. This control is being associated with a region, but the control is already bound to something else. If you did not explicitly set the control's DocumentItemsSource property, this exception may be caused by a change in the value of the inherited RegionManager attached property..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExDockSiteHasToolItemsSource
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DockSite's ToolItemsSource property is not empty. This control is being associated with a region, but the control is already bound to something else. If you did not explicitly set the control's ToolItemsSource property, this exception may be caused by a change in the value of the inherited RegionManager attached property..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExRegionNameCannotBeChanged
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The region name cannot be changed after it has been set..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExRegionViewAlreadyExists
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified view is already defined in the region..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExRegionViewNameAlreadyExists
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A view with the specified name '{0}' is already defined in the region..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExRegionViewNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified view is not defined in the region..

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.Resources.ExStringCannotBeNullOrEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified string parameter cannot be null or empty..

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Products.Docking.Interop.Prism.SR
member.summary: Provides access to the string resources of this assembly, also allowing for their customization.
member.remarks:
Call the method to return a resolved resource string. If a custom string has been set for a specified string resource name, it will be returned. Otherwise, the default string resource value is returned.
If any of the resource strings are customized via a call to , it is best to do so before any other classes in this assembly are referenced, such as in the application startup.

member.summary: Removes all custom strings.

member.summary: Returns whether a custom string is defined for the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource for which to search.
member.returns: true if a custom string is defined for the specified string resource; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Prism.Regions.Behaviors.DockSiteRegionBehavior
member.summary: Defines the attached behavior that keeps the items of the host control in synchronization with the .
member.remarks: This behavior also makes sure that if a view is in the region is activated, then it's associated window in the is activated. In addition, if you active a window in the , then it's associated view is activated in the region.

member.value: A nullable that indicates whether the associated window has an options menu available. The default value is .
